Header._Description: bind up a dialog to the view model

CodeTemplate.Code: this.WhenAnyValue(x => x.ViewModel.SeasonSelectDialog) .IsNotNull() .DistinctUntilChanged() .Where(_ => _seasonSelectDialog == null) .Select(vm => new SeasonSelectDialog(vm)) .ObserveOn(RxApp.MainThreadScheduler) .Subscribe(ui => _seasonSelectDialog = ui) .DisposeWith(ControlBindings);
